awards.text: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 1 win & 6 nominations.

fullplot: A lonely Navy sailor falls in love with a hooker and becomes a surrogate father figure for her son during an extended liberty due to his service records being lost.
plot: A lonely Navy sailor falls in love with a hooker and becomes a surrogate father figure for her son during an extended liberty due to his service records being lost.
title: Cinderella Liberty
